Text: I read this book many years ago. It had a profound effect on me. Unless you are one of THEM, you will need a book like this to understand this disorder. Its so bizarre that you will never figure it out yourself. One way or another, your life (and government) is being run by people with this disorder. Until now, both the book and audio book have been unavailable on the net. Thanks so much!

Most welcome crowd. For those who need but didn't notice; the scanned PDF e-book version is here:
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6553812
Thanks heaps! Most of our politicians are sociopaths!
thank you very much to all of you.
